044e2036a518de2ccac9318ccba07f7ce10e4a1c.query:
INSERT INTO mcaptcha_pow_confirmed_stats 
        (config_id, time) VALUES ((SELECT config_id FROM mcaptcha_config WHERE key = $1), $2)

06699fda6b1542bf4544c0bdece91531a3020c24.query: SELECT email, secret  FROM mcaptcha_users WHERE name = ($1)

2b319a202bb983d5f28979d1e371f399125da112.query:
--  mark a notification as read
UPDATE mcaptcha_notifications
    SET read = TRUE
WHERE 
    mcaptcha_notifications.id = $1
AND
    mcaptcha_notifications.rx = (
        SELECT
            id
        FROM
            mcaptcha_users
        WHERE
        name = $2
    );

4303f5c6ef98e0de9d8d3c2d781d3ffaa3dee5f7.query:
SELECT time FROM mcaptcha_pow_confirmed_stats 
            WHERE 
                config_id = (
                    SELECT config_id FROM mcaptcha_config 
                WHERE 
                    key = $1
                AND
                     user_id = (
                        SELECT 
                            ID FROM mcaptcha_users WHERE name = $2))
                ORDER BY time DESC

4c3a9fe30a4c6bd49ab1cb8883c4495993aa05f2.query:
SELECT 
            difficulty_factor, visitor_threshold 
        FROM 
            mcaptcha_levels 
        WHERE config_id = $1 ORDER BY difficulty_factor ASC

60081afa71dca3d10b372aabfdbc809f0cf62b33.query:
INSERT INTO mcaptcha_notifications (
              heading, message, tx, rx)
              VALUES  (
              $1, $2,
                  (SELECT ID FROM mcaptcha_users WHERE name = $3),
                  (SELECT ID FROM mcaptcha_users WHERE name = $4)
                      );

726a794f7599b78ab749d9f887f5c28db38f072b.query:
INSERT INTO mcaptcha_pow_fetched_stats 
        (config_id, time) VALUES ((SELECT config_id FROM mcaptcha_config WHERE key = $1), $2)

76d1b62e0c70d09247691ca328d8674c8039fab9.query:
SELECT key, name from mcaptcha_config WHERE
        user_id = (SELECT ID FROM mcaptcha_users WHERE name = $1)

84484cb6892db29121816bc5bff5702b9e857e20.query:

            WHERE config_id = (
                SELECT config_id FROM mcaptcha_config 
                WHERE 
                    key = $1
                AND
                     user_id = (
                        SELECT 
                            ID FROM mcaptcha_users WHERE name = $2)) 
                ORDER BY time DESC

9bfdbc25316c623f8f19bb24e636bf8d0c930a06.query:
DELETE FROM mcaptcha_sitekey_user_provided_avg_traffic 
        WHERE config_id = (
            SELECT config_id 
            FROM 
                mcaptcha_config 
            WHERE
                key = ($1) 
            AND 
                user_id = (SELECT ID FROM mcaptcha_users WHERE name = $2)
            );

a1c49ee377d6ac57fb22c9eac0ef1927a97087ab.query:
SELECT name FROM mcaptcha_config 
                WHERE key = $1 
                AND user_id = (
                    SELECT user_id FROM mcaptcha_users WHERE NAME = $2)

ada91fac02c7bba9b13deebccda6f6fc45773b5a.query:
SELECT config_id, duration, name from mcaptcha_config WHERE
        key = $1 AND
        user_id = (SELECT ID FROM mcaptcha_users WHERE name = $2)

c399efd5db1284dcb470c40f9b076851f77498c7.query:
SELECT time FROM mcaptcha_pow_fetched_stats
            WHERE 
                config_id = (
                    SELECT 
                        config_id FROM mcaptcha_config 
                    WHERE 
                        key = $1
                    AND
                        user_id = (
                        SELECT 
                            ID FROM mcaptcha_users WHERE name = $2))
                ORDER BY time DESC

dbe4307651d94bc6db4f1d8b2c6d076fde628098.query:
INSERT INTO mcaptcha_pow_solved_stats 
        (config_id, time) VALUES ((SELECT config_id FROM mcaptcha_config WHERE key = $1), $2)

dcf0d4f9d803dcb1d6f775899f79595f9c78d466.query:
-- gets all unread notifications a user has
SELECT 
    mcaptcha_notifications.id,
    mcaptcha_notifications.heading,
    mcaptcha_notifications.message,
    mcaptcha_notifications.received,
    mcaptcha_users.name
FROM
    mcaptcha_notifications 
INNER JOIN 
    mcaptcha_users 
ON 
    mcaptcha_notifications.tx = mcaptcha_users.id
WHERE 
    mcaptcha_notifications.rx = (
        SELECT 
            id 
        FROM 
            mcaptcha_users
        WHERE
            name = $1
        )
AND 
    mcaptcha_notifications.read IS NULL;
